## Return Value

A [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/SparseIterativeMethod] structure that represents a generalized minimal residual (GMRES) method.

## Discussion

Use GMRES to solve *Ax = b* when *A* is symmetric indefinite or unsymmetric.

For symmetric positive-definite systems, use [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/SparseConjugateGradient(_:)]. For rectangular or singular systems, use [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/SparseLSMR(_:)].

# SparseGMRES(_:)

**Function**

Returns a generalized minimal residual (GMRES) method with specified options.

## Declaration

```swift
func SparseGMRES(_ options: SparseGMRESOptions) -> SparseIterativeMethod
```

## Parameters

- **options**: The options to use when creating the GMRES method, such as the maximum number of iterations to perform.

## Return Value

A [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/SparseIterativeMethod] structure that represents a generalized minimal residual (GMRES) method.

## Discussion

Use GMRES to solve *Ax = b* when *A* is symmetric indefinite or unsymmetric.

For symmetric positive-definite systems, use [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/SparseConjugateGradient(_:)]. For rectangular or singular systems, use [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/SparseLSMR(_:)].

## Sparse Iterative Methods for Symmetric Indefinite and Unsymmetric Coefficient Matrices

- **SparseGMRES()**: Returns a generalized minimal residual (GMRES) method.
- **SparseGMRESOptions**: Options for creating a generalized minimal residual (GMRES) method.
